messages.author: Ben Goodger (Google)
messages.text: You're not allowed to use default values for parameters per Google style.

messages.author: jeremya
messages.text:
On 2012/02/16 04:44:12, Ben Goodger (Google) wrote:
> You're not allowed to use default values for parameters per Google style.

Done.

messages.author: Ben Goodger (Google)
messages.text:
no default values.

Rename your variable to lock_in_aero_glass_, default to false, and provide a set_lock_in_aero_glass() setter that yo call from your function.

messages.author: jeremya
messages.text:
On 2012/02/16 04:44:12, Ben Goodger (Google) wrote:
> no default values.
> 
> Rename your variable to lock_in_aero_glass_, default to false, and provide a
> set_lock_in_aero_glass() setter that yo call from your function.

Did this a slightly different way, since ScopedRedrawLock does its work in its constructor.
